matrix-project.description: This job builds the APARAPI Sample Sources using the chosen JDK.

hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.name: BUILD_SELECTOR_APARAPI_W
hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.description: Uses the APARAPI.jar from the specified APARAPI_W build job.

scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir
